body_html: @mmolaro Actually, GCR is built to support public images (like this one), as well as serve more core infrastructure needs ("I want to serve images to other parts of my cluster"). But I'm looking into getting us on dockerhub, too.

body: @mmolaro Actually, GCR is built to support public images (like this one), as well as serve more core infrastructure needs ("I want to serve images to other parts of my cluster"). But I'm looking into getting us on dockerhub, too.
